title: AI-Enabled Mobile Learning Course for Strengthening Managerial Decision-Making Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary business concepts and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: AI-driven personalized learning environment for novice professional learners in managerial/leadership roles

learning_goals: Learners will perform management decision-making simulations with 85% or higher accuracy using AI-based adaptive comparative judgment tools.
Learners will write self-reflection reports twice weekly based on generative AI feedback and develop judgment competency improvement plans.
Learners will conduct three or more comparative judgment practices in dynamic simulation environments and propose decision-making improvements incorporating feedback.
Learners will interpret AI analysis results to create team-based management strategy reports and obtain qualitative feedback of 4.0/5.0 or higher through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
